definition: having a softening or soothing effect especially to the skin, a medication (in the form of an oil or salve etc.) that soothes inflamed or injured skin
details:
adjective
- having a softening or soothing effect especially to the skin
= synonyms: emollient, salving, softening
noun
- a medication (in the form of an oil or salve etc.) that soothes inflamed or injured skin
